page.title: 13Catbrook Football Club
page.content: Football is an important recreation in the area. Catbrook Football Club was formed in l9l3, and is one of the oldest clubs in the East Gwent League. At the moment it plays on the Catbrook Playing Field and has done so for the last l2 years. Previously they played on seven different grounds with local farmers' consent. The Catbrook Football team has throughout the years achieved many honours, winning the league lO times, the Watkins Shield ll times and the Harry Gill Cup nine times. They have won the Second Division once and the Argus Shield twice. Catbrook Football teams have had a very good past and they will hopefully have a good future.
